text: ao banda anak mean chomnue. chaur puok anak tangokhluoncha anak del brakean khchab nouv karpit daembi a l laoh chea anak del thveusaeaksaei daoy you tde thmr . chaur puok anak brakean khchab nouv pheap you tde thmr thveuchea saksaei daembi a l laoh . haey chaur kom bandaoy aoy kar saabkhpaem robsa krom muoy thveu aoy puok anak br pru td ampeu a you tde thmr aoy saoh . chaur puok anak brakean khchab nouv pheap you tde thmr proh vea chit bamphot knong kar kaotakhlach a l laoh . haey chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh doeng bamphot nouv avei del puok anak br pru td
